EmailTemplate.name: LNS Sales Ambassador Training 15/02/2016
EmailTemplate.subject: Exciting NCS Ambassador Opportunity - This Saturday!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
This Saturday 20th of February we have a fantastic opportunity for our fantastic NCS Ambassadors to be involved with!
Lewisham Youth Conference is a one day event featuring amazing guest speakers, outstanding workshops and singers and dancers from all over the UK.
Our Sales Team will also be having a stall to tell up to 500 young people all about NCS and why they should say YES! We would love to have the support from our NCS Ambassadors and for you to share your stories!
When Saturday 20th of February and we have two slots available either 1) 10:45 - 14:00 or 2) 14:00 - 17:00.
Where Goldsmiths University, Lewisham Way, New Cross, London, SE14 6NW.
We only have 6 spaces available (3 in each slot) so please email rhiannon.downer@the-challenge.org to reserve your space.
As an extra special thank you, you will also get an NCS Volunteer Hoodie, A FREE TICKET to the NCS Action Day Part on Saturday 5th of March, and you will be entered into our half term draw and could win a Beats Pill Portable Speaker!
If you would like your travel costs reimbursed please ensure you bring a receipt.
Any questions please do ask!
Rhiannon Downer
Graduate Associate Manager 07876836445
